# Wall of Law (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] \[[[Lawful Spells|lawful]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 7]], [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** A straight wall whose area is up to one 10-ft. square/level or a sphere or hemisphere with a radius of up to 5 ft./2 levels

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** See text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 234

*You invoke the abjuration, and a wall of translucent silver energy springs up before fading away to nothingness.*

This spell functions like *[[Wall of Good (Spell)|wall of good]]*, except that chaotic creatures are blocked.

*Arcane Material Component:* Powdered silver worth 25 gp.
